alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Holmes; Inland Bay; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 2:55PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Bay, east central Walton, southwestern Holmes and central Washington Counties through 345 PM EDT/245 PM CDT/... At 255 PM EDT/155 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Vernon to 8 miles north of Lynn Haven. Movement was northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Vernon, Live Oak, Ponce De Leon, Caryville, Westville, Ebro, Hinsons Crossroads, Red Bay, Whitehead Crossroads, Greenhead, Camp Flowers, Red Head, Holmes Valley, Millers Ferry, Five Points, Knox Hill, Smyrna, Spring Hollow, Sylvania and Riverside. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Holmes; Inland Bay; Washington
